name: Wooden Furniture & Sculptures
short_description: Explore our collection of beautifully crafted wooden furniture and sculptures, ranging from elegant dining tables to exquisite carved sculptures.

name: Wooden Home Decor
short_description: Discover unique wooden home decor items that add warmth and character to your living spaces, including wall clocks, photo frames, and more.

name: Wooden Utensils and Kitchenware
short_description: Enhance your culinary experience with our range of high-quality wooden utensils and kitchenware, perfect for cooking, serving, and dining.

name: Jute Home Decor
short_description: Add a touch of eco-friendly charm to your home with our collection of jute home decor items, including rugs, wall hangings, and storage solutions.

name: Jute Kitchenware & Utensils
short_description: Discover stylish and sustainable jute kitchenware and utensils that make cooking a pleasure while reducing your environmental footprint.

name: Jute and Wooden Jewellery
short_description: Accessorize sustainably with our range of jute and wooden jewellery, featuring bohemian-inspired necklaces, earrings, and bracelets.
